languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс оборачивается на Идиру. Вам не видно выражения его лица, но женщина вдруг сжимается и тупит взгляд.{/n}
{n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс оборачивается на Идиру. Вам не видно выражения его лица, но женщина вдруг сжимается и тупит взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se tourne vers Idira. Son visage vous est caché, mais vous voyez Idira se recroqueviller sur elle-même et fixer le sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se tourne vers Idira. Son visage vous est caché, mais vous voyez Idira se recroqueviller sur elle-même et fixer le sol.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがイディラに向き直る。彼の顔は見えないが、イディラが突然縮こまり、目を伏せるのがあなたにはわかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがイディラに向き直る。彼の顔は見えないが、イディラが突然縮こまり、目を伏せるのがあなたにはわかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希转向伊迪拉。你没有看到他的表情，但伊迪拉却突然退了一步，低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希转向伊迪拉。你没有看到他的表情，但伊迪拉却突然退了一步，低下了头。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wendet sich zu Idira. Du siehst sein Gesicht nicht, doch Idira schrumpft plötzlich zusammen und senkt den Blick.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wendet sich zu Idira. Du siehst sein Gesicht nicht, doch Idira schrumpft plötzlich zusammen und senkt den Blick.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se gira hacia Idira. Aunque no ves su cara, sí ves a Idira encogerse y bajar la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se gira hacia Idira. Aunque no ves su cara, sí ves a Idira encogerse y bajar la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, İdira'ya dönüyor. Yüzünü göremiyor ama İdira'nın birden ürküp başını eğdiğine şahit oluyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns to Idira. You do not see his face, but you do see Idira suddenly shrink and cast her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, İdira’ya dönüyor. Yüzünü göremiyorsun ama İdira’nın birden ürküp başını eğdiğine şahit oluyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
